show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: All Together Now
content: Update on the “Larry Summers Is 0 for 6″ Informational Campaign — Charlene Spretnak tells listeners about the shift in… attitude at the New York Times (editorial; article by Joseph Stiglitz); gives background information on the scheduled guest, Elizabeth Dodson Gray, but problems with her phone prevent the interview, which will be rescheduled in October
